page.title: 08BROOK FARM
page.content: 1 BROOK FARM WAS CHOSEN BECAUSE THE OWNER ,MR WRIGHT ,PRACTICES{MIXED {FARMING}.THIS ILLUSTRATES THE VARIETY OF CROPS AND ANIMALS KEPT IN THIS AREA.THE FARM IS IN THE PARISH OF GREAT BENTLEY TO THE SOUTH OF OUR AREA. {LABOUR MR WRIGHT EMPLOYS NINE REGULAR MEN,THREE PART_TIME WOMEN AND IN THE FRUIT_PICKING SEASON HE EMPLOYS 50 EXTRA WORKERS.{ {SIZE,CROPS AND ACRES.} THE FARM, WHICH IS 430 ACRES, HAS 120 ACRES WHEAT 80 ACRES BARLEY 50 ACRES POTATOES 50 ACRES PEAS FOR SEED 70 ACRES GREEN BEANS 8 ACRES SOFT FRUIT 1 ACRE SWEETCORN 2 ACRES FODDER BEET
